summary: Experienced Technical Consultant Project lead with a demonstrated history of working in the Automotive and Microelectronics industry. Skilled in Agile management, Scrum way of working, Coaching, directing, Issue Tracking, Change Management and Embedded Systems development. Talented born leader with strong engineering background.
